poem:
Title: "Inversion of Allegiance"

An ensign inverted, a country unnerved,
Clung high on the eaves of Justice unperturbed.
Reflection asks of this topsy-turvy display,
Echoing discord in democratic ballet.
Trump's claims to the waiting winds unfurl,
Revising truths into a fearsome whirl.
In Justice's shadow, a flag whispers distress,
Yet faith in America's rule shall not egress.
